NewText_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>If you're planning to travel, <clr:0000>Enchanted<clr:ffff>
should be your first stop!

The <clr:0000>radiant attire<clr:ffff> would suit you, I think.
NewText_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Hm? Well, well. Look who's here. You're
looking spritely, I must say.
NewText_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Let me get a good look at that outfit...


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>That's stealth attire, isn't it? My, my!
It suits you!

You'll be happy with your purchase.
I'm sure of it!
NewText_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Think>Hm? Well, well. Look who's here. You're
looking peppy, even in this rain.
NewText_75:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Let me get a good look at that outfit.


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>That's radiant attire, isn't it? My, my!
It suits you!

You'll be happy with your purchase.
I'm sure of it!
ReturnHome_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>I wondered who was in my house, but I
recognize you. The one who gave us the
porridge, right?<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>If you came hoping to buy clothes, do me
a favor and go to Enchanted instead.
ReturnHome_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Huh? I recognize you.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>If you came hoping to buy clothes, <sp:5:0:0>do me
a favor and go to Enchanted instead.
NewText_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I'm just leaving for the shop. Wait a
moment, if you please.
NewText_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That porridge... That was <clr:0000>sunny veggie
porridge<clr:ffff>, wasn't it?

I've never tasted anything quite like that!
It was as if poison were drawn from my
body. And such a comforting flavor too!
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I feel like I have a whole new lifetime
ahead of me.
NewText_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>If you're planning to travel, <clr:0000>Enchanted<clr:ffff>
should be your first stop!

The <clr:0000>stealth attire<clr:ffff> would suit you, I think.
NewText_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_01>I'm going to rest...


But <clr:0000>Enchanted <clr:ffff>is still open, so you still
have time to shop!
NewText_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>My, my! What brought you here? Were
you worried about me, hm?

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Well, don't you fret. Thanks to you, I'm
feeling better than I ever have.
NewText_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Well, well. Look who's here. Isn't it a bit
early, hm?
NewText_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>We sure appreciate your business! You're
one of our very best customers.

Remember, we're happy to buy if you're
selling. So visit <clr:0000>Enchanted<clr:ffff> when you have
business to do!
